page.title: 11Some Cornish Churches
page.content: Many people in the district attend Church or Chapel and there is a Methodist Chapel and a Church of England in the area.Catholics however have to go to Truro to worship. The Methodists have a lot of church activities and a lot of children attend Sunday School. The Church of England have a large Church at Perranzabuloe.The saint of the Church is St.Piran.The Church was built because the original St.Pirans Church which was built on the Perranporth sand dunes got covered over by sand. The Church of all denomanations is an important aspect in the social life of the residents of the area catering for both young and old.
